text: Rostislav Ivanovich YankovskyРостислав Янковский (, ; 5 February 1930 - 26 June 2016) was a Belarusian actor. He was born in Odesa. He studied in Leninabad.Умер брат Олега Янковского. Биография He debuted in the Tajik theatre in 1951. Since 1957, he worked in the Minsk Drama Theatre. Yankovsky was named a People's Artist of the USSR in 1978. Yankovsky died in Minsk on 26 June 2016 in Minsk, Belarus, aged 86.В Минске умер белорусский актер Ростислав Янковский ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Belarusian people Category:Movie actors Category:Stage actors Category:Actors from Odesa
title: Rostislav Yankovsky
